content.question: <math alttext="the integral from 10 to infinity, of, the fraction with numerator 1000, and denominator x squared, end fraction, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mo stretchy="true">∫</mo><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1000</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></math> is
